verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) O Lord, <WH3068> who <WH4310> may abide <WH1481> <WH7931> in Thy tent <WH168>? Who <WH4310> may dwell <WH7931> on Thy holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>?
He who walks <WH1980> with integrity, <WH8549> and works <WH6466> righteousness, <WH6664> And speaks <WH1696> truth <WH571> in his heart. <WH3824>

He does not slander <WH7270> with his tongue, <WH3956> Nor <WH3808> does <WH6213> evil <WH9567> to his neighbor, <WH7453> Nor <WH3808> takes <WH5375> up a reproach <WH2781> against <WH5921> his friend; <WH7453>

In whose eyes <WH5869> a reprobate <WH3988> is despised, <WH959> But who honors <WH3513> those who fear <WH3372> the Lord; <WH3068> He swears <WH7650> to his own hurt, <WH7489> and does not change; <WH4171>

He does not put <WH5414> out his money <WH3701> at interest, <WH5392> Nor <WH3808> does he take <WH3947> a bribe <WH7810> against <WH5921> the innocent. <WH9345> He who does <WH6213> these <WH428> things <WH428> will never <WH3808> <WH5769> be shaken. <WH4131>
